connector.description: Produces periodic messages with a custom payload.

camel.kamelet.timer-source.period.name: camel.kamelet.timer-source.period
camel.kamelet.timer-source.period.description: The interval (in milliseconds) to wait between producing the next message.

camel.kamelet.timer-source.message.name: camel.kamelet.timer-source.message
camel.kamelet.timer-source.message.description: The message to generate. Example: hello world

camel.kamelet.timer-source.contentType.name: camel.kamelet.timer-source.contentType
camel.kamelet.timer-source.contentType.description: The content type of the generated message.
